00021 class DataReader {
00022 
00023  public:
00024     DataReader( const std::string &filename ):_filename(filename){;}
00025     virtual ~DataReader(){;}
00026     
00027     std::string getFilename() { return _filename; }
00028 
00029     virtual bool isDone()=0;
00030     virtual int size() =0;
00031     virtual std::string getTypeString() =0;
00032 
00033  private:
00034     std::string _filename;
00035 
00036 };

00043 class RawDataReader : public DataReader {
00044 
00045  public:
00046 
00047     RawDataReader( const std::string &filename );
00048     
00049     virtual void getHeaderRecord( RawHeaderRecord &header )=0;
00050     virtual void getNextEventRecord( RawEventRecord &event )=0;
00051     virtual int  size()=0;
00052     virtual std::string getTypeString() =0;
00053 
00054     virtual int getType()=0;
00055     enum RunType { OTHER,HDF4,SIM,VTEXT };
00056 
00057     virtual bool isDone()=0;
00058     virtual ~RawDataReader(){;}
00059 
00060     enum EventTypes { EVENT, PEDESTAL, UNKNOWN };
00061 
00062 };
